title: (x) Nivea advert body copy - custom font (similar to Metro) {Mark S}
author: timfm

comments.content: This looks like [Metro](http://web.archive.org/web/20061127050628/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/metro-2/metrolite-two/testdrive.html?s=you%2C%a0while%a0skin%27s%a0own%a0ceramides&p=36) with the x-height raised. Maybe a custom version?

I think Nivea had a custom corporate font designed (it's close to metro). This is mentioned [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20061127050628/http:/www.metadesign.de/html/en/131.html) and I've seen it somewhere else but cannot find it right now.
the font is a custom font, designed by Achaz Prinz Reuss in 2001 for beiersdorf. his design based on metro black.
